subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: James Neal staked Pittsburgh to an early lead, and Marc-Andre Fleury and the rest of the Penguins then held on to beat the Islanders, 4-2, on Tuesday.
snippet: James Neal staked Pittsburgh to an early lead, and Marc-Andre Fleury and the rest of the Penguins then held on to beat the Islanders, 4-2, on Tuesday.
